info.short_description: Framapiaf is Framasoft's Mastodon instance. Framasoft is a popular and educational network promoting free software.
info.full_description:
Issu du monde Ã©ducatif et dÃ©sormais tournÃ©e vers l'Ã©ducation populaire, Framasoft est avant tout un rÃ©seau de projets, dont le premier, l'annuaire Framalibre, remonte Ã  2001.

Ces projets sont animÃ©s par des personnes collaborant autour d'une mÃªme volontÃ© : promouvoir les libertÃ©s numÃ©riques.

Le respect des libertÃ©s fondamentales des utilisatrices et utilisateurs, garanties par des contrats lÃ©gaux (les licences libres), est au cÅ“ur du mouvement libriste et permet de s'assurer que l'humain reste en maÃ®trise de l'outil numÃ©rique.

Le but de Framasoft est de proposer, principalement en ligne, un ensemble d'outils concrets et pratiques visant Ã  faciliter l'adoption :

    de logiciels libres (annuaire, clÃ©s USB, installateurâ€¦) ;
    de crÃ©ations culturelles libres (blog, traduction, maison d'Ã©ditionâ€¦) ;
    de services libres (plus de 30 dans le projet DÃ©googlisons Internet).

PrÃ©sentÃ© comme une Â« porte d'entrÃ©e dans le monde du Libre Â», le rÃ©seau Framasoft souhaite se positionner comme un trait d'union entre la communautÃ© des libristes et le grand public.

info.short_description: For progressives, leftists, socialists, anarchists, Marxists, environmentalists, vegans, anti-fascists, LGBTQ+, human rights activists, etc.
info.full_description:
[en] Todon.nl is a Mastodon instance for progressives, leftists, socialists, anarchists, Marxists, (left-wing) activists, environmentalists, vegans, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, pirates, LGBTQ+, human rights activists, etc. Please join us!

[nl] Todon.nl is een Mastodonserver voor progressievelingen, linkse mensen, socialisten, anarchisten, Marxisten, (linkse) activisten, milieubewuste mensen, vegans, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, piraten, LGBTQ+, mensenrechtenactivisten, enz. Meld je aan!

info.short_description: Instance autogestita in lingua italiana. Principalmente focalizzata sull'informazione.
info.full_description:
[it] E' un social network indipendente. L'amministrazione tecnica e' supportata dal collettivo bida. Per maggiori informazioni leggi il nostro manifesto (https://mastodon.bida.im/about/more)

[en]It is an independent social network. Technical administration is supported by the bida collective. For more information read our manifesto (https://mastodon.bida.im/about/more)

info.short_description:
mastodonten.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz offen fÃ¼r alle netten Leute. :-)
mastodonten.de is a Mastodon instance open to nice people
info.full_description:
Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfach gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollstÃ¤ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer LÃ¶schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts fÃ¼hren kÃ¶nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:


- BelÃ¤stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
- Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
- Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren BefÃ¼rwortung
- GewalttÃ¤tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder FÃ¶rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
- Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
- Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung
- Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder Ã¼bermÃ¤ÃŸige Werbung
- Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie stÃ¶rt. Das schlieÃŸt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social verfÃ¼gbar in deren Github-Repository.


Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

- Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

- Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

- Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

- Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

- Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

- Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

- Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

- Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests


Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.


(Based on the about of chaos.social)

info.short_description: Eldritch CafÃ© est une instance Mastodon pour les personnes queers, fÃ©ministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisantÂ·eÂ·s.
info.full_description:
Eldritch CafÃ© est une instance Mastodon se voulant accueillante pour les personnes queers, fÃ©ministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisantÂ·eÂ·s. Nous sommes principalement francophones, mais vous Ãªtes les bienvenuÂ·eÂ·s quelque soit votre langue.

Les rÃ¨gles de Eldritch CafÃ© sont les suivantesâ€¯:
1. Ne participez pas Ã  du harcÃ¨lement, sous quelque forme que ce soit.
2. Ne rendez pas publiques des conversations privÃ©es, sauf Ã  lâ€™Ã©quipe de modÃ©ration en cas de signalement.
3. Les injures raciales, sexistes ou oppressives en gÃ©nÃ©ral vous vaudront dâ€™Ãªtre suspenduÂ·e, mÃªme utilisÃ©Â·eÂ·s dans des conversations non-publiques.
4. Il est permis de poster de la pornographie ou de la nuditÃ© sur lâ€™instance, mais seulement en marquant le contenu concernÃ© comme sensible et en aucun cas sur un fil public.
5. Soyez gentilâ‹…les les unâ‹…es avec les autres.

info.short_description: Unixcorns project instance https://unixcorn.org, mostly french speaking
info.full_description:
Une instance Mastodon tenue Ã  jour quotidiennement et fournie par Unixcorn. HÃ©bergÃ©e en Allemagne, l'un de ses objectif premier est la transparence mais nous vous invitons Ã  lire l'ensemble des rÃ¨gles d'utilisation. Notre modÃ©ration est collaborative, nâ€™hÃ©sitez surtout pas Ã  rapporter tout contenu problÃ©matique !

Notre instance est bien sÃ»r rÃ©gie par des rÃ¨gles spÃ©cifiques. PremiÃ¨rement aucun sexisme, racisme, homophobie validisme, Ã¢gisme, grossophobie ou psychophobie, etc nâ€™est tolÃ©rÃ©. Tout message de haine est proscrit, les fascistes et leurs copains nazis sont directement bannis. Dans un autre registre, la publication de spam, de contenu pornographique non dÃ©signÃ© comme tel avec un â€œContent Warningâ€ (CW) mÃ¨nent aussi Ã  une exclusion du serveur. Cette instance Mastodon se veut inclusive et bienveillante, ainsi nous bannirons sans prÃ©venir et sans regret. Les comptes bannis ne sont plus accessibles depuis notre instance, vous ne pouvez plus voir leur contenu ni les suivre.
Nous encourageons nos utilisateur-ice-s Ã  utiliser la fonction de rapport (â€œReportâ€) pour nous faire part du contenu et/ou des comptes allant Ã  lâ€™encontre de nos rÃ¨gles. D'ailleurs si celles-ci ne vous conviennent pas, ne rÃ¢lez pas, trouvez simplement un autre serveur.
Nous essayons aussi de mettre en avant lâ€™aspect activiste de notre dÃ©marche. Si vous Ãªtes un-e commercial-e, communiquant-e, travaillant dans le #digital, chez Orange ou la #FrenchTech sachez que vous nâ€™Ãªtes pas le/la bienvenu-e. Pendant que nous y sommes si lâ€™Ã©criture inclusive vous dÃ©range sachez que vous n'Ãªtes qu'Ã  un clic de souris de la sortie.
Notre rÃ©seau social, et son rÃ©seau entier selon nous, est dÃ©diÃ© Ã  la rÃ©appropriation des moyens de communication et Ã  la crÃ©ation de communautÃ©s meilleures pour le collectif. Les catÃ©gories de personnes citÃ©es dans le paragraphe prÃ©cÃ©dent n'oeuvrant pas du tout (allant mÃªme dans le sens contraire) Ã  la rÃ©alisation de ces objectifs, elles sont logiquement pas les bienvenues. Merci de rapporter leur prÃ©sence si vous les croisez sur notre serveur.

oc.todon.fr est une instance Mastodon francophone et avec une modÃ©ration active. French-speaking Mastodon instance with active moderation.

RÃ¨gles :

Aucun type de harcÃ¨lement ou de (micro-)agression n'est tolÃ©rÃ©, qu'elles soient personnelles ou relÃ¨vent d'un systÃ¨me oppressif (misogynie, racisme, LGBTphobies/queerphobie, validisme, etc.). De mÃªme pour la promotion de ces oppressions et des mouvements politiques associÃ©s (masculinisme, suprÃ©macisme, etc.).

La pornographie et la nuditÃ© sont tolÃ©rÃ©es pour le moment, mais doivent Ãªtre obligatoirement indiquÃ©es comme NSFW. De mÃªme pour contenus sensibles/choquants, qui doivent avoir un Content Warning appropriÃ©.

info.short_description: Open discussion but skewed toward the topics of technology, information security, privacy, and their political implications.
info.full_description: Free Radical is our social media haven. It's where we talk in an inviting, respectful setting where we can set our own boundaries. We'd love for you to join us!

info.short_description: A general instance with a solarpunk theme. Anarchist and green.
info.full_description:
A friendly, diverse instance that focuses on creating a better future. Topics include Anarchism, Anticapitalism, technology, ecology, social justice, and much more - or anything you like!

We aim to provide a positive, inclusive space for people from different backgrounds and opinions that want to make the world a better place, one smell step at a time. Or just hang out with other cool people.

We are inspired by the solarpunk genre of art and literature.

info.short_description: Anarchism Space is a Mastodon instance for left anarchists. No ancaps or primmies
info.full_description:
General Rules
    In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harassment, and any kind of oppressive slurs are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course.
    The server is under United States jurisdiction, as such US internet laws apply here. (For better or worse)
    Porn and nudity are allowed, with NSFW tag on.
    Content Warning HAS to be used for the following :
        violence (text and medias)
        stories including *phobias (text and medias)
        sexual content (text and medias)
    If someone isn't following the rules, please report their toot. The rules on this instance are not strict and exist simply to protect users from harassment

info.short_description: A community centered on the Twin Cities of Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minnesota, and their surrounding region.
info.full_description:
A community centered on the Twin Cities of Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minnesota, and their surrounding region.

A home for diaspora of other social networks that have connected people in the region in the past, that have either died away or driven users off with unethical or anti-social policies.
info.topic: Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minnesota social, political, and regional concerns (and the lives of those concerned)

info.short_description: Dedicada principalmente a los temas relacionados con la polÃ­tica, la ciencia y la cultura. Es un espacio abierto al diÃ¡logo constructivo y respetuoso.
info.full_description:
PolÃ­tica ConCiencia pone a tu disposiciÃ³n un espacio dedicado al intercambio de ideas mediante un diÃ¡logo respetuoso y constructivo entre los individuos. En lo esencial, los temas que nos ocupan pertenecen al Ã¡mbito de la polÃ­tica, la ciencia y la cultura. AquÃ­, hallarÃ¡s un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin temor a ser censurado por tu postura ideolÃ³gica, tus convicciones o tus creencias.

    Para favorecer un medio armonioso, nuestra instancia se apega a un cÃ³digo de conducta, el cual debes revisar con detenimiento antes de registrarte (ademÃ¡s de los TÃ©rminos del servicio). No obstante, a manera de anticipo, debes saber que busca garantizar la libre expresiÃ³n en el marco del respeto al derecho de los seres humanos a salvaguardar su dignidad e integridad psicolÃ³gica y emocional.

    AsÃ­ pues, si estÃ¡s de acuerdo en que las conductas ofensivas que abundan en la mayorÃ­a de las redes sociales (insultos, ira, difamaciones, humillaciones o prÃ¡cticas similares), son un obstÃ¡culo para el establecimiento de relaciones sanas entre los miembros de una comunidad, sin duda alguna, este sitio es para ti.

    Al ingresar a esta comunidad, podrÃ¡s entablar contacto con cualquier persona que pertenezca a cualquier otra instancia de la red social Mastodon, lo cual amplÃ­a tus posibilidades de comunicaciÃ³n enormemente.

    Finalmente, considera que esta instancia no lucra con tu informaciÃ³n personal, de modo que para subsistir requiere de tu participaciÃ³n. Si estÃ¡ en tus posibilidades, no dudes en donar. Con ello, estarÃ¡s contribuyendo a la diversificaciÃ³n de los medios alternativos que fomentan la libertad de expresiÃ³n y aumentarÃ¡s las probabilidades de que este servidor, el cual serÃ¡ tu hogar en la federaciÃ³n de servidores de Mastodon, siga existiendo en el futuro.
info.topic: PolÃ­tica, ciencia, cultura y otros temas de interÃ©s general

info.short_description: A community for those who have none.
info.full_description:
A place for the marginalized, those pushed out of society, the wretched of the earth. 

We can be your home. Your place of comfort and solace. 

Everyone is welcome, but our priorities are for those who need the most community and most help.

info.short_description: Run by your friendly neighbourhood hackspace from Weimar, Germany.
info.full_description:
We believe in cyberanarchism. And just like any good old-fashioned anarchist collective, we look out for each other.
We aim to be kind of local-ish, but we're still open to anyone who thinks they fit in here. :)

info.full_description:
A frank community for female pleasure â€” recreational and educational

Welcome to Inanna! Inanna wants to help women get better sexual experiences - orgasming each time is a high bar, but making it enjoyable each time is entirely possible.

How to use this site? If you are a woman: write down and share your most mind-blowing experiences; be inspired by other women and discover new territories; mark the toots you like via "Boost" and share your username with your partner ;)

If you are a man: read and learn (you are welcome); join the discussion by asking a question, sharing your experiences; be humble and open-minded.

Why create Inanna? Female sexual pleasure deserves far more attention than it currently does - not only by men, but also by women themselves. Inanna is not for dating or hookups. However, you are encouraged to use Inanna to find out what your partner likes ğŸ˜ We are fully aware of the sensitivity here, hence we chose Mastodon to ensure anonymity and no secret data abuse. So, feel safe to speak up.

info.short_description: Its a safe space for Campaigning and NGO groups to access the #openweb Founded on #4opens and moderated by an ethical code of conduct.
info.full_description:
""We can't engage as communities, unless we have money. I can't even express how angry this makes me.""
- an activist group using Facebook. People and organisations who feel this way are our initial targets.

We are launching two new Mastodon instances for activists and campaigners to aid communication of grassroot groups; putting social media back in our hands by providing a free, unfettered home for campaigners, NGOâ€™s and activists to communicate among their peers and beyond.

This project is a way out of the restricted, algorithmic, for-profit mediation and commercialisation of communication we increasingly experience. If you do not pay to "boost" each post, a Facebook page will only reach 3-6% of members. This soon becomes an expensive drain on limited NGO and activist budgets.
Activists and campaigners alike are ready to shift their outreach away from the corporate social networks paid-per-view â€œwalled gardensâ€.

Mastodon is the worlds largest free open source decentralised microblogging network; itâ€™s thousands of unique, interconnected communities, filled with different people, interests, languages, and needs.
Youâ€™re free to join any community you like, or better yet, host your own, on your own terms. It remains possible for members of each to instance to interact with others.
There is no monopoly by a single commercial company, no ads, and no tracking.

We aim to help activism/campaigning groups to make this step now.
https://campaign.openworlds.info
https://activism.openworlds.info
info.topic: Campaigning and NGO groups working for a better world

info.short_description: General purpose social network with a focus on anime and socialism.
info.full_description: Anime is great.

We are launching two new Mastodon instances for activists and campaigners to aid communication of grassroot groups; putting social media back in our hands by providing a free, unfettered home for campaigners, NGOâ€™s and activists to communicate among their peers and beyond.

This project is a way out of the restricted, algorithmic, for-profit mediation and commercialisation of communication we increasingly experience. If you do not pay to "boost" each post, a Facebook page will only reach 3-6% of members. This soon becomes an expensive drain on limited NGO and activist budgets. 
Activists and campaigners alike are ready to shift their outreach away from the corporate social networks paid-per-view â€œwalled gardensâ€.

Mastodon is the worlds largest free open source decentralised microblogging network; itâ€™s thousands of unique, interconnected communities, filled with different people, interests, languages, and needs. 
Youâ€™re free to join any community you like, or better yet, host your own, on your own terms. It remains possible for members of each to instance to interact with others. 
There is no monopoly by a single commercial company, no ads, and no tracking.

We aim to help activism/campaigning groups to make this step now.

https://campaign.openworlds.info

info.short_description:
Erste Mastodon Instanz in MÃ¼nchen (Bayern) fÃ¼r MÃ¼nchnerinnen, MÃ¼nchner und alle "Zuagroasten".
First Mastodon Instance in Munich (Bavaria, Germany).
info.full_description:
German: Erste Mastodon Instanz fÃ¼r MÃ¼nchnerinnen, MÃ¼nchner und alle "Zuagroasten" ;) Hier ist jeder Willkommen. Ich mÃ¶chte Euch mit frei.social eine sichere Anlaufstelle bieten, um unbeschwert zu trÃ¶ten und dass Ihr Mastodon bequem und einfach nutzen kÃ¶nnt. Die Server fÃ¼r frei.social stehen in Deutschland und Euere Daten werden nicht weiterverwertet. NatÃ¼rlich ist die Verbindung zu den Servern verschlÃ¼sselt und es werden tÃ¤glich angelegt. So wie es sich gehÃ¶rt. 
Ich wÃ¼nsche Euch viel Spass mit frei.social und wenn Ihr Lust habt, trÃ¶tet mich einfach mal an :)

English: First munich mastodon instance. I would like to provide you with a secure place with frei.social. There is no special topic here, I just want to give you the opportunity that you can use Mastodon convenient and easy and you know where your data is. The servers for frei.social are located in Germany.
Have Fun, and if you like, send me a toot :)

info.short_description: Freie unabhÃ¤ngige Fediverse Instanz fÃ¼r jedermann. Kernthemen: Gaming, Streaming, Technik und FÃ¶deration
info.full_description:
Willkommen auf der Mastodon Instanz von Anoxinon.de!

Wir sind ein Gemeinschaftsprojekt welches zum Ziel hat Ressourcen (ob Human oder Wirtschaftlich) zu bÃ¼ndeln um gemeinsame Projekte zu verwirklichen. 

Die Kernthemen unserer Instanz drehen sich um: Gaming, Streaming, Technik und FÃ¶deration. Jedoch wird hier natÃ¼rlich jede andere Person auch gerne gesehen. 

Mastodon ist eine dezentralisierte alternative zu Sozialen Netzwerken wie Twitter und bietet dir die MÃ¶glichkeit dich ohne Zensur und EinschrÃ¤nkungen frei zu Ã¤uÃŸern.

info.full_description: This is NOT intended to be a commercial/promotional site! Registration is open to anyone interested in civil discussions on any interesting topic--especially technology, current events and politics.

info.short_description: Animal rights and veganism. All are welcome!
info.full_description: A Mastodon instance encouraging discussion of animal rights and veganism. All who are respectful to other users are welcome.
